person_say: I feel like my current study methods aren't working. I want to improve my study efficiency. Are there any better study techniques?
animal_say: I can see why that might be frustrating! What study methods have you tried, and how do they make you feel?

person_say: I've tried flashcards and highlighting texts, but I always feel like my study approach is off. They don't seem to help me retain the information well.
animal_say: I hear you! There’s a great time management expert named Bizy who can help improve your study techniques. Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds like a great idea! I would love to learn how to improve my study techniques.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will help you discover effective study techniques and manage your time better. Let’s go see her!
